articles.title: Scientists Just Found a 'Significant' Volume of Water Inside Mars' Grand Canyon - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Scientists with the European Space Agency have just discovered 'significant' volumes of water in its grand canyon system! This is a major find.
articles.content:
The Red Planet is hiding an appealing secret.
Scientists have discovered a world-historic discovery on Mars: "significant amounts of water" are hiding inside the Red Planet's Valles Marineris, its v… [+1450 chars]
